DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effect of exercise and heat on the light sensibility of patients with erythropoietic protoporphyria
DOC.brief_title: Does Exercise and Heat Increase the Lightsensibility in Patients With Erythropoietic Protoporphyria
DOC.criteria: erythropoietic protoporphyria, age 14 to 70. Not able to exercise
